Title: Sources and Methods
Writer: Patrick Aison (story by), Patrick Aison (teleplay by), Tom Clancy (based on characters by), Carlton Cuse (created for television by), Annie Jacobsen (teleplay by), Graham Roland (created for television by)
Actors: John Krasinski, Wendell Pierce, Abbie Cornish, Ali Suliman
Plot: Jack's moral code is tested when he and Greer use a Turkish criminal to help them track down a high-value target who may be able to lead them to Suleiman. Hanin tries to evade her pursuers ...
